trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_SEQ_00<tab>Zeynuha has a sack of giantsgall for you.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the sack of giantsgall to Nidhana.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Nidhana.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Radiant Host soldier.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Thancred.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_ZEYNUHA_000_000<tab>Here you are─a sack of the purest giantsgall. We always set some aside for our alchemist friends.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_ZEYNUHA_000_001<tab>When you deliver it, let the good folk of the Great Work know that we're grateful for their efforts. If they need more, they need but ask.

TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_ZEYNUHA_000_010<tab>Payment? You needn't worry─the satrap will see us compensated. But even if he did not, we wouldn't hesitate to provide what we can. We're in this fight together, after all.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_020<tab>Ah, welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Dare I hope you have the giantsgall?
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_021<tab>Oh my, such fine specimens! Thank you so much for bringing these!
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_022<tab>We now have everything we need to make our next prototype─one that should be capable of passing our most rigorous tests.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_023<tab>When it is ready, it will be time for the <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> test, so please take your ease while you can!
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_THANCRED_000_030<tab>Nothing unusual so far. Don't worry about us─think only of your own task.

TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_URIANGER_000_035<tab>The warding scale doth promise to alter the course of conflict. Yet even as it giveth us cause to rejoice, we must needs brace ourselves for the Telophoroi's response.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_ESTINIEN_000_040<tab>What of that boy... Varshahn, was it?
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_ESTINIEN_000_041<tab>Running this and that errand for the satrap, you say... ...Hm? Why do I ask? 'Tis nothing. Curiosity.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_RADIANTHOST04375_000_045<tab>The satrap has granted you the use of this boat. May it serve you well!
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_050<tab>This is a rather finer boat than I had expected, but I won't complain.

TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_051<tab>All that remains is to board and be on our way. Oh, and if I should become corrupted, do not stay your hand. Of course I pray it does not come to that, but you must protect yourself.

TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_052<tab>Other alchemists can fulfill my role, but you and your blessing are one of a kind...and perhaps our only hope for toppling this tower. For all our sakes, do not hesitate to do what must be done. Whatever that may be.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_NIDHANA_000_053<tab>...Well, the longer I draw this out, the more nervous I become. Let's be off!
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_Q1_000_056<tab>Head to the Tower of Zot with Nidhana?
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_RADIANTHOST04375_000_060<tab>Ah, you are returned! But...where is Mistress Nidhana?
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_RADIANTHOST04375_000_061<tab>Manusya preserve... Just when we had succeeded in making the talisman...
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_RADIANTHOST04375_000_062<tab>I-I must report this at once! Meanwhile, please return to the Great Work!
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_URIANGER_000_070<tab>Thy demeanor bespeaketh consternation, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_ESTINIEN_000_075<tab>Hm... Bad tidings, I take it.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_THANCRED_000_080<tab>...Something's gone awry, hasn't it? What happened?
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_THANCRED_000_081<tab>So it was Fandaniel after all... Damn that bastard!
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_THANCRED_000_082<tab>I'm sure you wanted to do more...but you were right to return here first.
TEXT_AKTKMA119_04375_THANCRED_000_083<tab>We must tread warily lest we endanger Nidhana and the other captives.
